section.title: Description
section.p: This class provides details concerning any additional costs incurred or claimed for a dispensed prescription or service. Examples of such costs include shipping, compound preparation, incentives, and taxes.

stentry.p: "Amount representing the additional incurred costs for a dispensed prescription or service." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 480-H9, Data Dictionary 201104).
"Amount paid for additional costs claimed in Other Amount Claimed Submitted." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 565-J4, Data Dictionary 201104).
"Code identifying the additional incurred cost claimed in Other Amount Claimed Submitted" - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 479-H8, Data Dictionary 201104).
"Code clarifying the value in the Other Amount Paid." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 564-J3, Data Dictionary 201104).
Possible values include: Delivery Cost; Shipping Cost; Postage Cost; Administrative Cost; Incentive; Cognitive Service; Drug Benefit; Compound Preparation Cost Submitted; Sales Tax.
